definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: When he was not at the firm, Obama was teaching at the University of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 他不在事务所的时候，就会去芝加哥大学讲课。

sentences.english: Zhoubo, obtained his LLB degree from East China University of Politics and Law , is the senior partner of Shanghai Wintell Law Firm.
sentences.chinese: 华东政法大学法学学士，上海瀛泰律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: so I decided to pursue a job as a paralegal at a law firm.
sentences.chinese: 所以我决定去一家律师事务所找一份律师助理的工作。

sentences.english: One day, he saw a man coming up the sidewalk to his office.
sentences.chinese: 一天他看见一个男人正从人行道走进他的事务所。

sentences.english: The promoter shall be unlimitedly liable for the debts of the law firm.
sentences.chinese: 设立人对律师事务所的债务承担无限责任。

sentences.english: Elaine's just got a job in a firm of accountants.
sentences.chinese: 伊莱恩刚刚在一家会计事务所找到了一份工作。

sentences.english: In the early 2000, it developed into a law office under the cooperative shares system.
sentences.chinese: 2000年初改制成为股份合作制律师事务所，。

sentences.english: Gia was eventually called to New York to visit these agencies.
sentences.chinese: 最终，吉尔被纽约的模特事务所召雇。

sentences.english: The rebuilt path to the office is made of used sleepers and ballast.
sentences.chinese: 通往事务所的枕木步道整理得焕然一新。

sentences.english: He was a partner in a firm of solicitors in Holborn.
sentences.chinese: 他是荷尔本一家律师事务所的合伙人。

sentences.english: Aldisert is a partner at the law firm Kwika, in Santa Monica.
sentences.chinese: 他是圣莫尼卡的Kwika律师事务所合伙人。

sentences.english: or do things, you know, advocacy work that's not a law firm.
sentences.chinese: 或者为宣传机构工作，这些机构都不算是法律事务所。

sentences.english: And he started to practice at Guangdong Shenpeng Law Firm in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年始，执业于广东深鹏律师事务所。

sentences.english: Nearly 100 law firms are being referred to the Solicitors' Disciplinary Tribunal.
sentences.chinese: 近百家律师事务所被送上律师纪律法庭。

sentences.english: Firm lawyers once considered in-house attorneys less capable.
sentences.chinese: 事务所的律师曾一度认为公司法务能力较差。

sentences.english: I'm afraid they'vebeen overworking you again at the office.
sentences.chinese: 怕是他们在事务所又让你劳累过度了吧。
